title: Marina Beach
description: One of the longest urban beaches in the world, famous for its scenic beauty and vibrant atmosphere.

title: Meenakshi Temple
description: A historic Hindu temple known for its intricate architecture and vibrant sculptures.

title: Ooty Botanical Gardens
description: A beautiful garden in the Nilgiris, known for its exotic plant species and scenic views.

title: Kanyakumari
description: The southernmost tip of India, known for its stunning sunrise and sunset views over the ocean.

title: Brihadeeswarar Temple
description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site, this temple is an architectural marvel built during the Chola dynasty.

title: Yercaud
description: A serene hill station known for its beautiful lake, coffee plantations, and pleasant climate.

title: Rameswaram
description: A sacred town known for its Ramanathaswamy Temple and the famous Pamban Bridge.

title: Kodaikanal
description: A popular hill station, often called the 'Princess of Hill Stations', famous for its misty valleys and Kodai Lake.

title: Mahabalipuram
description: A coastal town famous for its rock-cut temples, especially the Shore Temple and Arjuna's Penance.

title: Mudumalai National Park
description: A wildlife sanctuary known for its rich biodiversity, including tigers, elephants, and leopards.

title: Light House
description: A historic Chola dynasty temple known for its grand architecture and intricate carvings.

title: Pichavaram Mangrove Forest
description: One of the largest mangrove forests in India, offering boat rides through scenic waterways.

title: Vellore Fort
description: A 16th-century fort known for its unique structure, grand moat, and Jalakandeswarar Temple inside.

title: Courtallam Waterfalls
description: Famous for its medicinal waterfalls, which attract tourists for their health benefits.

title: Sathyamangalam Wildlife Sanctuary
description: A vast forest reserve, home to diverse wildlife including tigers, elephants, and leopards.
